metadata.title: CVE-2016-10538 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The package `node-cli` before 1.0.0 insecurely uses the lock_file andlog_file. Both of these are temporary, but it allows the starting user tooverwrite any file they have access to.

criterions.comment: node-cli: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
